tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE energy_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, storage_unit_id INT, production DECIMAL, consumption DECIMAL, timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE energy_storage_unit (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    production_data NUMERIC,
    consumption_data NUMERIC
)

CREATE TABLE solar_panel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    serial_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    unit_id INT,
    efficiency DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES energy_storage_unit(id)
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbine (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    serial_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    unit_id INT,
    rotor_diameter DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES energy_storage_unit(id)
)

CREATE TABLE battery (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    technology VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    unit_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES energy_storage_unit(id)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_id INT NOT NULL,
  production_date DATE NOT NULL,
  production_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES storage_units(id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_id INT NOT NULL,
  consumption_date DATE NOT NULL,
  consumption_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES storage_units(id)
);

CREATE TABLE unit_location (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_id INT NOT NULL,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES storage_units(id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_id INT NOT NULL,
  log_date DATE NOT NULL,
  log_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES storage_units(id)
);
